title: JAM Bar and Restaurant
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Thai, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little restaurant and bar with 6 tables, opened in 2014 directly on Long Beach. Operates only during tourist season, otherwise closed. On the menu are some vegan suitable items like mango salsa, massamun curry with tofu, among others. Could specifically request to make a dish vegan.
